parameters.subject: üî• Exclusive Offer Just for You!
parameters.message:

**Why choose us?**

parameters.subject: Welcome! Here's what you need to know
parameters.message:
=Hi {{ $json.name || 'there' }},

Welcome to our community! I'm excited you're interested in what we have to offer.

üìö **Getting Started Guide**
I've put together some resources that might help:

üîç [Product Comparison Guide](https://yourstore.com/compare)
üí° [Customer Success Stories](https://yourstore.com/testimonials)
üìñ [Free Resource Library](https://yourstore.com/resources)

**What makes us different?**
{{ $json.source === 'organic' ? 'üåü You found us organically - that means our reputation speaks for itself!' : 'üåü Quality products with proven results' }}
{{ $json.company_size ? `\nüè¢ Perfect for ${$json.company_size} businesses like yours` : '' }}

**Next Steps:**
1. Browse our [product catalog](https://yourstore.com/products)
2. Check out our [pricing options](https://yourstore.com/pricing)
3. Join our [community forum](https://yourstore.com/community)

I'll follow up in a few days with more personalized recommendations based on your interests.

Best regards,
Marketing Team
Your Store

P.S. Keep an eye out for our weekly newsletter with tips and exclusive offers!

parameters.subject: Thanks for your interest!
parameters.message:
=Hi {{ $json.name || 'there' }},

Thank you for visiting our website and showing interest in our products!

üìß **Stay Connected**
I've added you to our newsletter where you'll receive:
- Weekly tips and insights
- Product updates and new features
- Exclusive subscriber-only offers
- Industry news and trends

üéÅ **Welcome Gift**
As a thank you, here's a 10% discount for when you're ready:
**Code**: WELCOME10

üìö **Helpful Resources**
- [Blog](https://yourstore.com/blog) - Industry insights and tips
- [FAQ](https://yourstore.com/faq) - Common questions answered
- [Contact Us](https://yourstore.com/contact) - We're here to help!

No pressure - take your time to explore. I'm here if you have any questions!

Best regards,
Marketing Team
Your Store

parameters.functionCode:
// Newsletter Content Generator
const topics = [
  {
    title: "5 Ecommerce Trends to Watch This Month",
    content: "Discover the latest trends shaping online retail and how to leverage them for your business growth.",
    cta: "Read Full Article",
    link: "https://yourstore.com/blog/ecommerce-trends"
  },
  {
    title: "Customer Success Story: 300% ROI Increase",
    content: "Learn how one of our clients tripled their return on investment using our platform.",
    cta: "View Case Study",
    link: "https://yourstore.com/case-studies/roi-increase"
  },
  {
    title: "New Feature: Advanced Analytics Dashboard",
    content: "Get deeper insights into your business performance with our newly launched analytics tools.",
    cta: "Explore Features",
    link: "https://yourstore.com/features/analytics"
  }
];

const selectedTopic = topics[Math.floor(Math.random() * topics.length)];

const newsletter = {
  subject: `üìà Weekly Insights: ${selectedTopic.title}`,
  content: `
# This Week's Highlights

## üåü Featured Article
**${selectedTopic.title}**

${selectedTopic.content}

[${selectedTopic.cta}](${selectedTopic.link})

## üìä Quick Stats
- üõí Average cart value increased 15% this month
- üì± Mobile traffic now represents 65% of all visits
- ‚≠ê Customer satisfaction score: 4.8/5

## üéØ This Week's Tip
**Optimize Your Product Descriptions**
Use emotional triggers and specific benefits rather than just features. Instead of "High-quality material," try "Luxuriously soft fabric that feels amazing against your skin."

## üî• Limited Time Offer
**Flash Sale**: 25% off all premium plans
**Code**: WEEKLY25
**Valid**: Until Friday midnight

[Claim Your Discount](https://yourstore.com/pricing?code=WEEKLY25)

## üìÖ Upcoming Events
- **Webinar**: "Scaling Your Ecommerce Business" - Thursday 2 PM EST
- **Product Demo**: "New Analytics Features" - Friday 11 AM EST

[Register for Events](https://yourstore.com/events)

---

**Follow Us:**
[Facebook](https://facebook.com/yourstore) | [Instagram](https://instagram.com/yourstore) | [YouTube](https://youtube.com/yourstore)

You're receiving this because you subscribed to our newsletter.
[Unsubscribe](https://yourstore.com/unsubscribe) | [Update Preferences](https://yourstore.com/preferences)
  `,
  date: new Date().toISOString()
};

return [{ json: newsletter }];
